queryMap.query: SELECT '0' CHK, TIRB.RACELEN, TIRB.FROM_TIME, TIRB.TO_TIME, TIRB.GRD, TIRB.INST_ID, TIRB.INST_DTM, TIRB.UPDT_ID, TIRB.UPDT_DTM FROM TBDB_INDV_REC_BASIS TIRB
INSERT INTO TBDB_INDV_REC_BASIS ( RACELEN, FROM_TIME, TO_TIME, GRD, INST_ID, INST_DTM ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, SYSDATE )
UPDATE TBDB_INDV_REC_BASIS SET GRD = ?, UPDT_ID = ?, UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE RACELEN = ? AND FROM_TIME = ? AND TO_TIME = ?
DELETE FROM TBDB_INDV_REC_BASIS WHERE RACELEN = ? AND FROM_TIME = ? AND TO_TIME = ?
